Original:
MUU真的是太讚了，他們的水煙超順，芒果口味是我的最愛，甜甜的，不會膩。他們的調酒也超好喝，有很多種類，我個人很喜歡他們的詩人系列調酒，很有氣質，也很有味道。他們的服務也超好，會主動關心你的需求，讓你感覺很舒服。
我和朋友去MUU玩了一晚，服務很好，氣氛很棒，音樂很有感覺。我們點了幾種水煙，都超好抽，味道也超特別。我最愛的是芭樂口味，香香甜甜的，不會膩。我們還嘗了他們的川味滷味，超下酒，辣得剛剛好。
EN:
MUU is really too much. Their water smoke is super smooth. The taste of mango is my favorite, sweet and not greasy.Their bartending is also very good. There are many types. I personally like their poets series. I am very temperament and taste.Their services are also super good, and they will take the initiative to care about your needs and make you feel comfortable.
My friend and I went to MUU for one night. The service was very good, the atmosphere was great, and the music felt very good.We ordered a few types of water cigarettes, all of which were super good and the taste was super special.My favorite is the flavor of the guava. It is sweet and not greasy.We also tasted their Sichuan flavors, super wine, spicy.
